scripts.local: pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && echo 'run `yarn run log` to tail the logs'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf packages/react-sprucebot/node_modules/ && rm -rf packages/sprucebot-node/node_modules/ && rm -rf packages/sprucebot-skills-kit/node_modules/ && rm -rf packages/sprucebot-skills-kit-server/node_modules/
scripts.s3-sync-heartwood-canary: aws s3 sync ./packages/heartwood-components/build/ s3://canary-heartwood.sprucelabs.ai/ --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=300,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep
scripts.s3-sync-storybook-canary: aws s3 sync ./packages/react-heartwood-components/storybook-static/ s3://canary-storybook.sprucelabs.ai/ --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=300,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep
scripts.s3-sync-heartwood-dev: aws s3 sync ./packages/heartwood-components/build/ s3://dev-heartwood.sprucelabs.ai/ --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=300,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep
scripts.s3-sync-storybook-dev: aws s3 sync ./packages/react-heartwood-components/storybook-static/ s3://dev-storybook.sprucelabs.ai/ --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=300,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep
scripts.s3-sync-heartwood-prod: aws s3 sync ./packages/heartwood-components/build/ s3://heartwood.sprucelabs.ai/ --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=300,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep
scripts.s3-sync-storybook-prod: aws s3 sync ./packages/react-heartwood-components/storybook-static/ s3://storybook.sprucelabs.ai/ --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=300,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep
scripts.s3-sync-stylesheets-latest: aws s3 sync ./packages/heartwood-components/public/stylesheets/ "s3://cdn.spruce.ai/stylesheets/$(node -p "require('./packages/heartwood-components/package.json').version")/" --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=604800,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep && aws s3 sync ./packages/heartwood-components/public/stylesheets/ "s3://cdn.spruce.ai/stylesheets/latest/" --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=300,public --metadata-directive REPLACE --exclude=.gitkeep
